Class Coffee

java.lang.Object
Coffee
public class Coffee extends Object
The Coffee class represents a coffee with its name, calories, price, and ingredients. It provides methods to get the coffee name, calories, price, and ingredients, as well as a method to set the coffee name based on its ingredients.

    • Coffee

      public Coffee(int calories, int price, ArrayList<ArrayList<Ingredient>> ingredients)

      price - The price of the coffee.
      ingredients - The list of ingredients used to make the coffee.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the coffee.
      Returns:
      The name of the coffee.

    • setCoffeeName

      public void setCoffeeName()
      Sets the name of the coffee based on its ingredients. It checks the counts of specific ingredients to determine the coffee name.

    • getCalories

      Gets the number of calories in the coffee.
